entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 p.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brockville 11:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
Temperature: 9.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 8.8°C
Wind: NE 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 8.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then 40 percent chance of showers. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
